notes: URLs are canonical public sources for statutory/regulatory text. Use these in UI; avoid hardcoding into contract comments.

authorities.title: Clean electricity production credit
authorities.feoc_relevance: Contains restrictions relating to prohibited foreign entities and material assistance cross-referencing IRC §7701(a).
authorities.pinpoint: See subsection(s) addressing prohibited foreign entity/material assistance (cross-ref to §7701(a)(51)-(52)).

authorities.title: Clean electricity investment credit
authorities.feoc_relevance: Contains restrictions for 'material assistance from a prohibited foreign entity' (cross-ref to IRC §7701(a)(52)).

authorities.title: Advanced manufacturing production credit
authorities.feoc_relevance: Contains restrictions for (i) taxpayer as prohibited foreign entity and (ii) 'material assistance from prohibited foreign entities' (cross-ref to IRC §7701(a)(51)-(52)).
authorities.pinpoint: Restriction paragraphs and subparagraphs referencing §7701(a)(51) and §7701(a)(52).

authorities.title: Definitions (including prohibited foreign entity / material assistance definitions)
authorities.feoc_relevance: Defines 'prohibited foreign entity' and related terms in §7701(a)(51) and 'material assistance from a prohibited foreign entity' in §7701(a)(52) (as reflected in current codifications).

authorities.title: Definition of 'foreign entity of concern' (FEOC)
authorities.feoc_relevance: Baseline FEOC definition used across federal programs; referenced in FEOC/PFE frameworks.

authorities.title: Foreign entity of concern (regulatory definition)
authorities.feoc_relevance: Implements FEOC definition in DOE context for certain programs.

authorities.citation: DOE Interpretive Guidance on Foreign Entities of Concern (May 2024)
authorities.title: DOE FEOC interpretive guidance
authorities.feoc_relevance: Interpretive guidance for FEOC definition and application in DOE-administered programs; useful for diligence and UI explanations.
authorities.pinpoint: Document overall; cite relevant pages in UI if quoting.
